title: Aishi No Sweet Voice
alternative_title: 愛しのスウィートボイス ; 사랑의 스위트 보이스 ; I Love Sweet Voice ; I Love Sweetvoice ; Itoshi no Sweet Voice
status: 愛しのスウィートボイス ; 사랑의 스위트 보이스 ; I Love Sweet Voice ; I Love Sweetvoice ; Itoshi no Sweet Voice
description:
Description :
        A young boy who has always hated his girlish voice meets a striking man with a captivating voice. They try to figure out their feelings while striving to realize their dreams in theater.
